DOC.brief_title: The Effect Acute Transcranial Bright Light Anxiety Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects ( n=30 ) anxiety symptom recruit study . To include study , subject get least seven point BAI ( Becks Anxiety Inventory ) . At begin study subject randomly assign 12 minute acute transcranial bright light placebo exposure group . Anxiety symptom measure use Spielberger State-Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI , form Y1 ) self-rating questionnaire 10 110 minute experiment .
